name: Arkanoid (itch) (NiTeGamesStudio)
description:
You see the red blocks over there? Yeah, on the screenshots. I think they said something about your mother... Grab the paddle and use the ball to destroy every single one of them. They sometimes drop some buffs that will make you stronger and help you beat them faster! Sometimes they will give you a nerf tho, making you far less efficient

HOW TO DOWNLOAD:

1. Press the download button

2. Right click on the .zip folder

3. Extract all...

4. Open the .exe with the games name
